name: Gravity Man (Random_du-de)
description:
Gravity Man is a short 2D game which i made out of boredom. The main feature of the game is that the player can manipulate gravity.

Link to the track i used in this game: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Wizwars/Game_Boy_Rock/04_8_Bit_Raceway

Hope you enjoy it!
